summary: A child escapes from Poland during World War II and first heads to Greece before coming of age in Canada.
cast: Robbie Kay|Monika Schurmann|Nina Dobrev|Jordan Pettle|Rade Serbedzija|Vieslav Krystyan|John Watson|Stephen Dillane|Rosamund Pike|Maggie Huculak|Devon Bostick|Diego Matamoros|Sarah Orenstein|Gray Powell|Dmitry Chepovetsky|Jennifer Podemski|Fiona Highet|Larissa Laskin|Daniel Kash|Themis Bazaka|Yorgos Karamihos|Danae Skiadi|Thanos Sakellariou|Anastassia Anastassopoulou|David Fox|Marcia Bennett|Mitchell Nye|Ed Stoppard|Rachelle Lefevre|Ayelet Zurer|Adrian Frieling|Stefen Rollpiller|Hailey Birnie|Birgitte Solem
title: Fugitive Pieces
